nodes.text: The Decimator cannon was a deployable heavy weapon employed by the Wookiees. It had the ability to transform it's all-terrain treads into firm stabilising feet. During the Battle for Alaris Prime, between 39 BBY and 36 BBY, Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn informed his Wookiee allies that they could construct Decimator cannons at their newly built fortress.
